mapper.select:
select attribute.id, entity_id, attribute.name, display_name, attribute.desc, status, sync_status, error_msg, data_type, data_type_length, data_type_decimal_length, data_type_format_id, display_width, form_promp_content, sort_wieght, enable_attribute_log, enable_readonly, enable_required, mdm_type, domain_id, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time from tb_attribute as attribute where attribute.del_flag=1
and ( attribute.name like concat('%', #{query.keyword}, '%') or display_name like concat('%', #{query.keyword}, '%') or attribute.desc like concat('%', #{query.keyword}, '%'))
order by sort_wieght asc

select entity.id, entity.model_id, entity.name, entity.display_name, attribute.id as aId, attribute.entity_id as entityId, attribute.name as aName, attribute.display_name as aDisplayName, attribute.data_type, attribute.domain_id from tb_attribute as attribute right join tb_entity as entity on entity.id = attribute.entity_id where attribute.del_flag=1 and entity.del_flag=1
mapper.update: update tb_attribute set status = 3 , sync_status = 2 where del_flag=1 and id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id as fieldId, entity_id as tableId, column_name as fieldName, `desc` as fieldDes, data_type_decimal_length as fieldPrecision, IFNULL(data_type_length, 0) as field_length from tb_attribute where instr(column_name,#{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR})>0 and del_flag = 1;
